message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for $95. I think you'll find it's a great deal for the value it provides.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate your suggestion. I am willing to pay $85 for the product.
Thanks for the offer, Bob. I understand your perspective, but I'm looking for something closer to $90.  Would you be willing to meet me halfway?
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. I would like to counter with an offer of $87 for the product.
